Name: Sato Dreams
About the game: The world of the future. Here, warriors are allowed inside arcade machines, and the best of the warriors of our future is a young e-sportswoman who proves to everyone her strength and courage in the war of the future, where skill and intelligence decide the outcome of the next battle. Sato Dreams - A colorful and bright arcade game where the player dodges bullets and picks up colored bonuses that increase the impact power, but which get confused when the bonus colors are mixed, dozens of enemies and an unlimited journey into the arcade world. Features of the game: - Increasing Difficulty - Vivid Visual Style - Dynamic music
